page.title: 06OUR PARENTS' JOBS
page.content: Almost all our parents have jobs of one kind or another. Quite a lot of people teach in schools or at cambridge univesity. The next most common full_time type of job is the building trade. Office workers form a big group but most of these jobs are part_time. Domestic jobs also tend to be done by mothers working part-time. Although we live in the middle of a farming area very few parents work in agriculture. One quarter of our parents work in the village;most of these in part-time jobs.The rest commute to Cambridge or further. No parents are classed as unemployed.
